sen.j: 康保4年（967年）、村上天皇が崩御して、冷泉天皇が即位すると関白太政大臣に藤原実頼、左大臣に源高明、右大臣には師尹が就いた。

sen.e: It was believed that Anna Incident was Norotada's plot to deprive Takaakira of his position, and people tend to say that Norotada's death only six months after his accession was due to Minamoto no Takaakira's resentment.
